Bitmap.getMaskPixel

Function/Meaning
Get pixel alpha value
Type
Method of Bitmap class
Syntax
getMaskPixel(x, y)
Arguments
x Specifies the x-coordinate value to get, in pixels.
y Specifies the y-coordinate value to get, in pixels.
Return Value
Pixel alpha value
Description
Gets the alpha value of the image pixel.
Reference
Bitmap.setMaskPixel
